Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. This item is worth significantly more than its face value, reflecting its high-quality materials and expert craftsmanship. Considering its unique features and benefits, I propose a special introductory price of $150 for you today. This is an exclusive opportunity to own something truly remarkable at a discounted rate. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget and preferences, so we can proceed with your purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
